attributes.action: Prevent the sale of British energy resources to the French.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So much of Great Britain's industry has already been abolished or sold out to foreign companies and governments, often with catastrophic results. Its high time the people took back their authority and put their foot down. If you do not want your energy supplies controlled from foreign soil sign this petition!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
